segments.text: Do you have anything to declare ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , how many tax-free things can I bring with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can take 100 cigarettes and 2 bottles of wine with you free of charge .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I have nothing to declare . I have just brought a bottle of wine .
segments.speaker: S2
